bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: Random crashes when running multiple server instances in parallel
bug.description: Sometimes the server crashes in GPU related methods when several instances are running in parallel or a very big number of cameras (6 or more) are attached to the vehicle.

comments.comment: I observed a couple of times that nvidia-smi reported a fault and all the applications using the GPU crashed.
AFAIK this still happens, but it is going to be very difficult to spot the bug. It could be anywhere, nvidia drivers, Unreal Engine, or the GPU running out of memory.
Issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/1>#1</denchmark-link> finally closed, this is an important milestone
